title: 05/28/21 DPS Hour 2 Aaron Boone
itunes:title: 05/28/21 DPS Hour 2 Aaron Boone
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, New York Yankees manager Aaron Boone tells Dan why former pinstripe legend Derek Jeter was actually a rare "six-tool" player. Plus, Dan reacts to Chicago Cubs shortstop Javy Baez's mind-boggling base running.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
